name: Rhel's Tale
description:
Embark on this bullet-hell journey to help Rhel fight against her inner demons!

Behind the curtain..

Q: Why is Rhel fighting a closet?
A: We wanted to portray the difficulty of someone trying to "come out of the closet". It's a difficult process, especially alone..

Q: What was your inspiration behind the art?
A: Our art inspirations came from Cult of the Lamb, Lo-fi playlist bedrooms, and the Beauty and the Beast wardrobe! (moodboard below)

Q: What was your biggest hurdle?
A: For programming - bullet patterns in 2.5D perspective proved especially difficult. Molly used some heavy trigonometry magic to get it to work. For art - lack of experience in perspective-based game drawing (and not being a 2D artist). This was a growing experience for all of us!

┏━━━━━━༻❁༺━━━━━━┓

     

Mouse & Keyboard required.

 - WASD to move
-  LMB / E to attack
-  LSHIFT / [SPACE] to dodge

┗━━━━━━༻❁༺━━━━━━┛

Rhel's Soup Service:

Molly Price - Programming, narrative
William Rose - Programming, cheerleading
Migle Ignotaite - Art & animation crafts

(with Andrew Gold's "Spooky Scary Skeletons" music)
Created for the 2022 10:10 WIG Jam.
